Constructor Detail

Tank

public Tank(java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.String name,
            int maxlife,
            int life,
            int maxshot,
            int shot,
            int maxmine,
            int mine,
            int strength,
            int speed,
            int rotation,
            int scale,
            int x,
            int y)
Constructor for the tank class. Gets all parameters from the level object.

Parameters:
id - The tanks id
name - The tanks name
maxlife - The tanks full life points
life - The tanks current life points
maxshot - The tanks max shot number
shot - The number of shots the tank still has
maxmine - The maximum number of mines the tank has
mine - The number of mines the tank currently has
strength - The tanks shot power
speed - The tanks speed
rotation - The tanks initial rotation
scale - The tanks scale
x - The tanks initial x position
y - The tanks initial y position
